A.J. Bonnema wrote:
> 
> 
> I just finished compiling a 1.5 version of junit. Still, I think it
> would be convenient to all to have both a pre-1.5 and a 1.5 available
> on the junit-site.
> 
> Is that an option?

We are working on JUnit for JDK 5.0, but slowly. For now, JUnit remains 
a JDK 1.4 and previous product. You can always recompile it on whichever 
platform you wish -- JUnit is small enough that providing binary 
distributions at all is just a convenience. :)

Take care.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
